commit.message:
* lex.c (java_read_unicode): Only accept leading `u's.

From-SVN: r40702

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+2001-03-20  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
+
+	* lex.c (java_read_unicode): Only accept leading `u's.
